abstract: Deutsche Bank joined a growing list of banks buffeted by the sovereign debt crisis on Tuesday, saying it would not meet its profit target for the year.
snippet: Deutsche Bank joined a growing list of banks buffeted by the sovereign debt crisis on Tuesday, saying it would not meet its profit target for the year.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT -- Deutsche Bank, Germany's biggest lender, joined a growing list of banks buffeted by the sovereign debt crisis on Tuesday, saying it would not meet its 2011 profit target owing to investor uncertainty and a loss from its Greek bond holdings.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank to Miss Profit Goal
